meanings.definition: A thin lightweight letter sheet that can be folded to form its own envelope for mailing.
meanings.sent1: I sent a special aerogramme to my pen pal overseas.
meanings.sent2: The aerogramme was perfect for sending a quick note to my friend.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally folded the aerogramme into a paper airplane before mailing it!
meanings.sent4: Her words flew off the aerogramme like birds taking flight.
meanings.sent5: The aerogramme felt like a secret message waiting to be discovered.

meanings.sent1: The aerogramme from my grandma always brightens my day.
meanings.sent2: Sending an aerogramme is faster than regular mail.
meanings.sent3: I pretended the aerogramme was a treasure map sent by a pirate!
meanings.sent4: His love for her soared through the aerogramme like a gentle breeze.
meanings.sent5: Receiving an aerogramme feels like a hug from far away.
